questionTitle: _________ is a standard of OASIS’s PSTC that conforms to the SOA architecture.
questionExplanation: SPML is an XML request/response language that is used to integrate and interoperate service provisioning requests.

questionTitle: A hybrid cloud combines multiple clouds where those clouds retain their unique identities but are bound together as a unit.
questionExplanation: A hybrid cloud may offer standardized or proprietary access to data and applications, as well as application portability.

questionTitle: _________ is one of the more expensive and complex areas of network computing.
questionExplanation: Ticket or token providing services, certificate servers, and other trust mechanisms all provide identity services that can be pushed out of private networks and into the cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following server performs the backups of clients without requiring any client-based software?
questionExplanation: CTERA cloud backup performs incremental backups from the server, compressing and encrypting the data that is transmitted to CTERA cloud storage servers where deduplication is performed.

questionTitle: Which of the following component is required for both online and local data access in hybrid application?
questionExplanation: If the application needed to access data only when the client was online, then access to cloud-based storage would be the only data store your application would required.

questionTitle: Which type of Hypervisor is shown in the following figure?
questionExplanation: A hypervisor running on bare metal is a Type 1 VM or native VM.

questionTitle: Redundancy has to be implemented at the _________ architectural level for effective results in cloud computing.
questionExplanation: ADrive provides online cloud storage and backup solutions for personal, business and enterprise-level data.

questionTitle: Which of the following is used for Web site monitoring and analytics?
questionExplanation: Ganglia is a distributed network monitoring software.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has an hourly rate with no long-term commitment?
questionExplanation: Pricing varies by zone, instance, and pricing model.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a first level cloud service attribute?
questionExplanation: These are key features for any cloud application.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Security can be set through passwords, Kerberos tickets, or certificates
questionOption2: Secure access to your EC2 AMIs is controlled by passwords, Kerberos, and 509 Certificates
questionOption3: Most of the system image templates that Amazon AWS offers are based on Red Hat Linux
questionExplanation: Hundreds of free and paid AMIs can be found on AWS.

questionTitle: Which of the following products have SOA management tool?
questionOption1: HP Software and Solutions OpenView SOA Manager
questionOption2: IBM Tivoli Framework Composite Application Manager
questionExplanation: These products have SOA tools for network management.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Load testing software is a large product category with software and hardware products
questionOption3: Load testing is useful in testing the performance of only Web servers
questionExplanation: Load testing is useful in testing the performance of not only Web servers, but also application servers, database servers, network throughput, load balancing servers, and applications that rely on client-side processing.

questionTitle: Which of the following IMAP command is used to update and amounts to a heartbeat signal and response?
questionExplanation: Some polling mechanisms set the polling interval so short that the system appears to behave as if it is a push technology.

questionTitle: In the parlance of system design, the active transfer process is referred to as “push” and server is called _______
questionExplanation: client is called Mail User Agent(MUA).

questionTitle: _______ provides virtual machines, virtual storage, virtual infrastructure, and other hardware assets.
questionExplanation: The IaaS service provider manages all the infrastructure, while the client is responsible for all other aspects of the deployment.

questionTitle: Which of the following resource has following graph structure for web servers?
questionExplanation: Whatever performance measurement tool you use, the goal is to create a set of resource utilization curves.

questionTitle: Which of the following can be considered as a distributed caching system?
questionExplanation: Amazon CloudFront is referred to as a content delivery network (CDN), and sometimes called edge computing.

questionTitle: Open source software used in a SaaS is called _______ SaaS.
questionExplanation: A considerable amount of SaaS software is based on open source software.

questionTitle: Which of the following area of cloud computing is uniquely troublesome?
questionExplanation: Storing data in the cloud is of particular concern.

questionTitle: A ________ is a logical unit that serves as the target for storage operations, such as the SCSI protocol READs and WRITEs.
questionExplanation: In traditional pooled storage deployments, storage partitions can be assigned and provide a device label called a Logical Unit Number.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most important client to back up in the cloud?
questionExplanation: Cloud storage solution should have multiplatform support.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a more sophisticated load balancer?
questionExplanation: They determine the current utilization of the resources in their pool.

questionTitle: Which of the following graph correctly describes relative costs and efficiencies of different physical and virtual servers?
questionExplanation: This type of graph allows you to add the appropriate server type to your infrastructure while performing a cost analysis of the deployment.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Use of different machine instance sizes is an attempt to create standard servers
questionOption2: Reducing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the same set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
questionExplanation: As much as possible, you also should assign servers standardized roles and populate those servers with identical services.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: A client can request access to a cloud service from any location
questionOption2: A cloud has multiple application instances and directs requests to an instance based on conditions
questionOption3: Computers can be partitioned into a set of virtual machines with each machine being assigned a workload
questionExplanation: Alternatively, systems can be virtualized through load-balancing technologies.

questionTitle: Which of the following combines a modeling language with a graphical display of the various SOA components?
questionExplanation: SOMF software allows developers to create an action plan to implement their business processes.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the central application in the AWS portfolio?
questionExplanation: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud enables the creation, use, and management of virtual private servers running the Linux or Windows operating system over a Xen hypervisor.

questionTitle: ____________ is a collection of integrated applications that are packaged within a complete desktop environment.
questionExplanation: Glide is compatible with Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Safari.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: The OCCI data object can manage CDMI containers
questionOption2: The CDMI data object can manage CDMI containers
questionOption3: OCCI can access objects stored in the cloud by using standard SMTP command
questionExplanation: The CDMI data object can manage containers that are accessible in cloud storage through other supported protocols.
